author: mike_morcous
post: One thing about the nativity is usually missed. A manger, in the Middle East, is a filthy place. I remember when I was young I refused to step into one because the ground was covered in animal excrement. I think one needs to see a manger in the middle east for himself to understand the depth of the humbleness of the Son of God. To choose a place like this to come to earth is beyond comprehension..
